title: Comedy Putin Would Love, Holocaust? Gotta Hear Both Sides 10.18.21
itunes:title: Comedy Putin Would Love, Holocaust? Gotta Hear Both Sides 10.18.21
description:
In episode 1010, Jack and Miles are joined by comedian and food writer Danny Palumbo to discuss the Jan 6th Subpoena Dodgers are entering the find out phase, Texas wants to BOTH SIDES the fucking Holocaust? Hannah Gadsby to Netflix: KEEP MY NAME OUT YOUR MOUTH, A Medical Condition Where You Have Zero Visual Imagination? And more!

FOOTNOTES:

  1. Jan 6th Subpoena Dodgers are entering the find out phase…UPDATE
  2. Texas wants to BOTH SIDES the fucking Holocaust? 
  3. Hannah Gadsby to Netflix: KEEP MY NAME OUT YOUR MOUTH
  4. A Medical Condition Where You Have Zero Visual Imagination?
  5. LISTEN: Gotts Street Park - Diego
